mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.room, c.begin_date, c.end_date, c.master_id, c.subject, c.create_time, c.update_time, e.name AS master_name, CASE WHEN c.begin_date > CURDATE() THEN '未开班' WHEN c.begin_date <= CURDATE() AND c.end_date >= CURDATE() THEN '在读' WHEN c.end_date < CURDATE() THEN '已结课' ELSE '未知' END AS status FROM clazz c LEFT JOIN emp e ON c.master_id = e.id WHERE c.id=#{id}
